params._quantity: : amount of tokens to be minted

params._symbol: : symbol / ticker of the NFT contract*

params._userWallet: : wallet to receive the minted NFT(s)

returns._0: reason : the reason why the user cannot mint

params._proof: : merkle tree proof used to verify whitelisted user
params._quantity: : amount of tokens to be minted

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

returns._0: result : array containing all the token IDs owned by `_owner`

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

returns._0: unclaimedSupply : the remaining supply to be minted for `_dropId`

DropSoldOut().notice: Error returned if the drop is sold-out*

IncorrectETHSent().notice: Error returned if user did not send the correct amount of ETH*

IncorrectInterface().notice: Error returned if the contract passed as parameters does not implement the expected interface  *

MaxMintPerAddress().notice: Error returned if user attempt to mint more than allowed by the drop*

NotEnoughTokensAvailable().notice: Error returned if the supply is sold out*

NotInMerkle().notice: Error returned if non-whitelisted user attempts to mint prior to public sale  *

NothingToWithdraw().notice: Error returned if there are no ETH to withdraw from the contract*

SaleNotStarted().notice: Error returned if the whitelist sale has not started yet*

claimTo(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Let a user mint `_quantity` token(s) of the given `_dropId`

getClaimIneligibilityReason(address,uint.notice: Returns the reason why `_to` cannot mint `_quantity` token from `_dropId`

mint(address,uint256,uint256,bytes32[]).notice: Let a whitelisted user mint `_quantity` token(s) of the given `_dropId`

price(uint256).notice: Returns the mint price for a given `_dropId`

setBaseURI(string).notice: Update the Base URI  Only the contract owner can perform this operation

setDropManager(address).notice: Update dropManager address  Only the contract owner can perform this operation

tokensOfOwner(address).notice: Return an array containing the token IDs owned by the given address

unclaimedSupply(uint256).notice: Returns the remaining supply for a given `_dropId`

withdrawAll().notice: Withdraw mint proceeds to Anotherblock Treasury address
